name: Haustorium (ParadoxReborn)
description:
You work for a galactic extermination company and your unit has been called in to manage an overgrowth on a remote greenhouse space station. When everything goes wrong, can you make it off the station before it's too late?

WASD to move. Click to shoot. E to interact. F to toggle flashlight.

Survive. 

All visual assets, audio, and scripts were made in-house.
